text: seongseoui baegseongdeul-iyeo neohui jong-gyoui hangyeleul neomji malmyeo hananim-e daehan jinsil oeeneun malhaji malla sil lo yesugeuliseudoneun maliaui a deul-ija hananim-ui seonjijalosseo mali a-ege malsseum-i iss-eoss-euni ineun ju nim-ui yeonghon-ieossnola hananimgwa seonji jadeul-eul middoe sam-wiilcheseol-eul malhaji malla neohuiege bog-i doelila sillo hananim-eun dan hanbun-isini geubun-ege neun adeul-i iss-eul su eobsnola cheonjiui samlamansang-i geubun-ui geos-ini bohoja neun hananimman-eulo chungbunhanila
